summary:
Hispaniola is an island in the Caribbean between Cuba and Puerto Rico. It's the biggest island in the West Indies after Cuba and has more people than any other island there. The island is split between two countries: the Dominican Republic in the east and Haiti in the west.

Christopher Columbus started the first European settlement here in 1492. For a long time, the whole island was ruled by Spain, but later, the French took over the western part. This island is where the Spanish language first took root in the Americas.
title: Hispaniola
